meanings.definition: Feeling or causing nausea or uneasiness.
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster ride made me queaziest.
meanings.sent2: The spoiled milk had the queaziest smell.
meanings.sent3: The thought of eating snails made her queaziest.
meanings.sent4: The queaziest feeling crept up on him like a sneaky cat.
meanings.sent5: The queaziest sensation lingered long after the boat ride.

meanings.sent1: After the long flight, she felt queaziest of all.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the foods, the seafood made him queaziest.
meanings.sent3: The queaziest cat in the house always avoided the fish.
meanings.sent4: His fear of heights made him the queaziest climber in the group.
meanings.sent5: The queaziest moment was when the plane hit turbulence.
